  • Uses of ICalculator in de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds

    Classes in de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds that implement ICalculator
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    HarmonicBondForceConservativeCalculator
    Harmonic bond conservative force calculator The following particle arrays are changed during accumulation process ("+-=" operations): ParticleArrays.getF_x ParticleArrays.getF_y ParticleArrays.getF_z NOTE: HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator parallelisation avoids collisions of access of particle indices thus a lock is NOT necessary.
    class 
    HarmonicBondPotentialCalculator
    Harmonic bond potential calculator NOTE: NO particle related array is changed.
    class 
    HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
    Harmonic bond property calculator for parallelised calculation of bond chunk properties.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ParticlePairInteractionCalculator
    Particle pair interaction calculator that uses CellBox and the cell linked-list method to determine particle pair interactions that are restricted to a defined cut-off length.

    ParticlePairS1mvvVelocityUpdateCutoff1Calculator
    Particle pair velocity update calculator for S1MVV integration type that uses ParticlePairInteractionCalculator to determine particle pair interactions that operate within a defined cut-off length of 1.0.
